photographerCategories.browseSubtitle: Find the perfect photographer for your special moments

eventCategories.browseSubtitle: Discover amazing events happening near you

hero.description: An all-in-one photography platform that allows photographers and their clients to connect for live sessions and safely archives their visual narratives in protected digital vaults.

getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.description: Describe your event and details. Get reviewed and recognized globally. Capture moments. Let every one come to you

photography.title: Photography
photography.description: Connect with photographers, capture memories and their visual narratives in protected digital vaults

goLive.title: Go Live
goLive.description: Live stream your event, get connected to far attendance, share moments and memories

forPhotographers.title: Photographers & Videographers
forPhotographers.description: Whether you're a photographer looking to grow your business or a client seeking to capture life's most important moments, our platform is built for you

whyAmoria.title: Why Amoria Connekyt Only?
whyAmoria.subtitle: The Amoria Connekyt Photographer Partnership Program is designed to build a strong, engaged, and motivated network of professional photographers who contribute to the creation of unforgettable and meaningful video stories.

ratedPhotographers.title: Rated Photographers
ratedPhotographers.description: Work with trusted photographers reviewed by the community and backed by platform verification

liveStreaming.title: Live Streaming
liveStreaming.description: Go beyond memories‚Äîhost and share your event live with real-time reactions and over dual-event split-screen streaming!

securePayments.title: Secure Payments
securePayments.description: Set your price, get offers, and pay safely through our secure platform. Your payment is protected until you're satisfied with the results

fullEventGallery.title: Full Event Gallery
fullEventGallery.description: Receive a beautifully curated gallery from your hired photographer and relive the memories anytime

globalNetwork.title: Connecting Photographers & Videographers with Clients Worldwide
globalNetwork.description: Amoria Connekyt brings together photographers and clients across continents. From live streaming events to secure digital vaults, we're building a global community that captures and preserves life's most precious moments.

footer.description: Connecting moments, creating memories. Your trusted platform for professional event photography and live streaming.
